record.titleTypeName: Birthplace of the First President of the University of Chicago
record.description: Miss Jane Harper, granddaughter of President William Rainey Harper, unlocking the Harper Cabin door before presenting the key to Muskingum College President Montgomery. The ceremony took place at the William Rainey Harper Memorial Convocation held in conjunction with the Muskingum College Centennial of 1937.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Negative on file.Attached to cardboard back.
